Actions.Name: Mud Spray
Actions.Description: A foe in range 3 is winded.

Actions.Name: Mudslide
Actions.Description: The Clot dashes 3, then creates a terrain effect in the spaces it just passed through. The effect is difficult terrain, and characters that enter the space for the first time on their turn or start their turn there must save or slip and be shoved 2 in a direction of the clot's choice.
